ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk
½ cup Jif® Creamy Peanut Butter
2 (6 ounce) packages white chocolate squares or white baking bars, chopped

cookingTips: Stir constantly over low heat to prevent scorching and ensure smooth texture
Press peanut butter mixture into parchment-lined pan evenly
Cut into squares while still slightly warm for clean edges
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Do you prefer chunky or smooth peanut texture in your fudge?
